function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The implementation of safety and surveillance technologies in smart cities","Impact":"Privacy and political freedom concerns in the Global North, service delivery concerns in the Global South","Mitigation":"Engage with civil society organizations and local communities to understand and address their specific concerns and needs","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving surveillance, community engagement platforms","People":"Residents of smart cities, civil society organizations","Owner":"Local governments, technology companies"},{"Description":"Use of enumeration in informal settlements to support rights claims in terms of service delivery","Impact":"Potential misuse of enumeration data, lack of privacy protection for individuals in informal settlements","Mitigation":"Implement data privacy regulations and protections, engage with local communities to ensure data integrity and consent","Technologies":"Data privacy tools, community data ownership platforms","People":"Residents of informal settlements, civil society organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, data protection organizations"},{"Description":"Intensive mobilization of smart urban technologies during the Covid-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased surveillance and data collection, potential privacy violations during a public health crisis","Mitigation":"Implement transparent data usage policies, engage with public health authorities and local communities to ensure ethical use of data","Technologies":"Ethical data collection and storage systems, public health monitoring platforms","People":"General public, public health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
